law.catch_line: Whenever a rollback vehicle, as defined in § 11-151.1 of this article, is being operated in combina...
law.text:
Whenever a rollback vehicle, as defined in § 11-151.1 of this article, is being operated in combination with a vehicle being towed, the towed vehicle shall be equipped to display, in accordance with the provisions of § 22-201.1 of this subtitle:
Tail lamps meeting the requirements of § 22-204 of this subtitle; and
Stop lamps and turn signals meeting the requirements of § 22-206 of this subtitle.
